short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Receive notifications from your Android phone right on your computer via Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get Android notifications right on your desktop!

Notify (together with the Notify Android app), work together to ensure that you stay productive, without having to check your phone each time a notification comes in. 

Notify for Android will forward all notifications from your Android phone straight to Notify for Chrome on your desktop, allowing you to see who's trying to get in touch with you. You can then choose to respond or not, all without the hassle of unlocking your phone.

** New in v0.14 **
  - As requested, configurable notification timeouts!
  - Notifications now come with an identifiable icon
  - Bug fixes

** Note **
 - Notify does not record any of your personally identifiable data
 - Notify requires that both phone and desktop be on the same wifi network
 - Notify encrypts messages sent between phone and desktop, ensuring your privacy


Get Notify for Android: http://bit.ly/notify_android
